# [6] Density Estimation

```{r}
x1 = c(rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = 1))
x2 = c(rnorm(50, mean = -1, sd = 1), rnorm(50,mean = 1, sd = 1))
x3 = c(rnorm(50, mean = -2, sd = 1), rnorm(50,mean = 2, sd = 1))
x4 = c(rnorm(50, mean = -3, sd = 1), rnorm(50,mean = 3, sd = 1))

for (x in list(x1,x2,x3,x4)) {
    # Rules of Thumb Methods
    d_silverman = density(x, bw = bw.nrd0(x), kernel = "gaussian")
    d_scott     = density(x, bw = bw.nrd(x), kernel = "gaussian")
    # Cross Validation Methods
    d_lscv      = density(x, bw = bw.ucv(x), kernel = 'gaussian')
    d_bcv       = density(x, bw = bw.bcv(x), kernel = 'gaussian')
    
    stripchart(x)
    plot(d_silverman, col = 'red')
    lines(d_scott, col = 'green')
    lines(d_lscv, col = 'blue')
    lines(d_bcv, col = 'purple')
    }

```
